## Libraries loading
```{r}
library(shiny)
library(leaflet)
```

## User interface
```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  tags$head(
    tags$link(rel = "stylesheet", type = "text/css", href = "styles/index.css")
  ),
  titlePanel("Artifacts explorer"),
  fluidRow(
    column(3, textInput("input", "Something gonna be here")),
    column(9, leafletOutput("map"))
  )
)
```

```{r}
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  output$map <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet() %>%
      addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerLite,
        options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)
      ) 
    })
  
  }
```

```{r}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
